snippet: Uncertainty about the outcome of the British vote on E.U. membership continues to on global markets, and polls suggest the result will be close.
abstract: United States stocks rise in response to testimony given by Federal Reserve chairwoman Janet L Yellen.
lead_paragraph: Uncertainty about the outcome of the British vote on E.U. membership continues to on global markets, and polls suggest the result will be close.

headline.main: Testimony by Yellen Nudges the Market Higher
headline.print_headline: Testimony by Yellen Nudges the Market Higher
